title: Feedback (falls under gameplay i guess)
body:
Apparently I have to leave feedback here, quoting the automated system.

Doesn't bother me because we all know this is gonna play out well.

I got a warning on the forums again for pointing out that reporting players does nothing and that someones elo was nothing but trolls. Funny why?
Because where was the lie? There wasn't one, yet it's titled don't be a jerk (funny coming from Riots mouth considering they sit there going "What way can we screw over the community today").
Poor as form from them. On par with femtard/SJW arguments. 

Lets point out their little board mod slaves now.
Hands down, some of the most blind people around. They argue there is absolutely nothing wrong with the community with no evidence yet when evidence provided, it gets down voted.

What I find amusing as all hell though is Ritos "Summoner Code" which clearly needs to be re-written to fit the community that it's currently looming over.
Be nice, respectful and play fair.
Funny that. The community gives BLMs a run for their money in terms of degeneracy.
You'd expect a good laugh here and there if your groups right?
LOLNOPE. 
Only thing funny is the attitude. 
While it states in summery, being respectful, the average comment is "F*** YOU F***ING C***" all over a kill or missed ult. Today alone, I had some ball fondler rage quit because he missed 1 Jhin bullet.

Why even queue if you were gonna troll?
Since riot refuse to clean up the community, we go to naming and shaming, which is magically wrong. Probably because it means to we Riots work for them, which would explain why they get triggered on par with Anita S. (person, not a champ RITO).

And whats funny with that?
The fact that if you play and want to climb, repeat a famous quote OR agree with a team mate, you get punished. But you can troll and ruin a game and riot will give you a handjob rather than punish you. BS right?
Punish people that enjoy it but give a nice wet BJ to people that ruin it? Kind of makes the summoner code redundant don't you think? Whats the point of it?
Kind of discriminating on players that are right don't you think?

So trolling, ruining the game, feeding, bring a d*** is perfectly alright, following the summoner code isn't though?
Flamings alright?
Carrying games, going B when almost dead and supportings wrong?
Giving suggestions and learning new champs is wrong?

 Rito clearly need to work on their company/systems/mod selection criteria BEFORE releasing new things. 

This will be downvoted to hell like all my posts calling riot and the community out. Why?
Because deep down, you know i'm right, but the big black d*** labeled RITO in your mouth makes you say no.

In the famous words that got me a chat restriction:
LEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEROY 
JEEEEEENKINS

replies.body:
Your comment was removed because of the "electroshock therapy" comment as was explained to you in the deletion notice. Such comments are dealt with swiftly and seriously, and you will face a ban of your boards account if you continue in that manner.

As I mentioned in your other thread, you are welcome to discuss the legitimacy of your chat restriction here on boards. Please do feel free to post the complete chat logs and we can discuss.
